last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 4
last_episode_to_air.overview: Max and Jake have a plan for final victory, but so does everyone else. Maggie’s enemies close in, and Sturrock’s bank sale is in danger.

name: Guilt
overview: Two brothers seem to get away with a crime - but soon discover they can trust no-one, including each other, in a pitch-black, contemporary thriller.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Season 2 begins as Max is released from prison after a two-year stint behind bars, and attempts to put his life back together. Unable to return to his old job, and with brother Jake now living in Chicago, Max realises he's going to have to work his way back up — which means working for his old accomplice, private detective and recovering alcoholic Kenny Burns.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Max and Jake find themselves back in Edinburgh , where they soon face a familiar danger.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: In a residential street in Edinburgh, brothers Max and Jake run down an old man while Jake is driving them back from a wedding - stoned and uninsured. They carry on with their lives, hoping Walter's death will be passed off as natural causes, but the brothers end up being pulled further into Walter's world.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Max does his best to take control, while Jake finds himself falling in love with Angie, the dead man's niece.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Jake and Angie's blossoming relationship creates difficulties between the brothers, leading Max to take decisive action against his sibling.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: When brothers Max and Jake unwittingly run over and kill an old man, their attempts to cover it up trigger consequences neither of them could ever have imagined.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: In an Edinburgh cellar, two gunshots ring out. Across town, Max McCall is released from prison. These two events gradually converge as Max tries to rebuild his life.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Max and Kenny find a local Minister more of an obstacle than they thought. Pressure builds for Erin, while Teddy is seeking answers.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Max and Erin’s relationship grows ever more complicated, as the pressure on Max from his police handler Jackie steadily increases, and he has a surprising meeting.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Max and Jake pick up arguments old and new, while the Lynch family face their darkest secret. Max offers Erin a way out but is running out of time to find one for himself.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Season 2 begins as Max is released from prison after a two-year stint behind bars, and attempts to put his life back together. Unable to return to his old job, and with brother Jake now living in Chicago, Max realises he's going to have to work his way back up — which means working for his old accomplice, private detective and recovering alcoholic Kenny Burns.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Skye's plan to try and to scare off Danny and his gang backfires, while Max and Jake's pub in Chicago is heading for financial ruin. Meanwhile, Sir Jim Sturrock opens a community centre in Leith, and Teddy is managing a cannabis farm in the Borders for Maggie Lynch.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Max and Jake seek refuge with a face from the past in the Highlands, but Teddy is on their trail. Scotland’s national bank is being sold, and Maggie sees an opportunity.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Max, Jake and their new gang hide from Maggie in Edinburgh and discover her link to Sir Jim Sturrock. Maggie exerts pressure on Teddy, while Aliza risks the bank sale.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Max and Jake have a plan for final victory, but so does everyone else. Maggie’s enemies close in, and Sturrock’s bank sale is in danger.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Max and Jake find themselves back in Edinburgh , where they soon face a familiar danger.
